00074 // Copyright (c) 2002-2003 GBDI-ICMC-USP
00075 #ifndef __STCOMMON_H
00076 #define __STCOMMON_H
00077 
00078 // All compilers
00079 #include <stdlib.h>
00080 
00081 // GNU GCC
00082 #ifdef __GNUG__
00083    #include <string.h> // malloc & cia
00084    
00085    // This is an useful function extracted from Windows C Runtime library.
00086    #define random(x) ((int)((((double)rand()) / ((double)RAND_MAX)) * (x)))
00087    
00088    // Mingw does not provide these values so, here they are.
00089    #ifdef __MINGW32_VERSION
00090       #define MAXSHORT    0x7fff
00091       #define MAXINT      0x7fffffff
00092       #define MAXLONG     0x7fffffff
00093       #define MAXDOUBLE   1.7976931348623158E+308
00094       #define MAXFLOAT    3.40282347E+38F
00095       #define MINDOUBLE   2.2250738585072014E-308
00096       #define MINFLOAT    1.17549435E-38F
00097       #define MAXLDOUBLE  1.1897314953572317649E+4932L
00098       #define MINLDOUBLE  3.362103143112094E-4917L
00099    #else 
00100       #ifdef __CYGWIN__
00101          #define MAXSHORT    0x7fff
00102          #define MAXINT      0x7fffffff
00103          #define MAXLONG     0x7fffffff
00104          #define MAXDOUBLE   1.7976931348623158E+308
00105          #ifndef MAXFLOAT
00106             #define MAXFLOAT    3.40282347E+38F
00107          #endif
00108          #define MINDOUBLE   2.2250738585072014E-308
00109          #define MINFLOAT    1.17549435E-38F
00110          #define MAXLDOUBLE  1.1897314953572317649E+4932L
00111          #define MINLDOUBLE  3.362103143112094E-4917L
00112       #else
00113          // Other gccs
00114          #include <values.h>
00115       #endif
00116    #endif //__MINGW32_VERSION
00117 #endif //__GNUG__
00118 
00119 // Microsoft Visual C++
00120 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00121    #include <limits.h>
00122    #define MAXLONG LONG_MAX
00123 #endif //_MSC_VER
00124 
00125 // Borland C++
00126 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
00127    #include <mem.h> // malloc & cia
00128    #include <values.h>
00129    using namespace std; // standard c++ lib classes
00130 #endif //__BORLANDC__
00131 
00132 #endif //__STCOMMON_H
